article_name: The 'religion' of Mozart's Requiem and aesthetic autonomy in its early reception

desc1: Brief entry concerning a book by Sacchi and the Mozarts' connection to it
desc2: Please note: I am not the author of this article. I am credited (and my work is cited), as a portion of the content is derived from an appendix in my master's thesis. The entry is by Dr David Black.
